https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2ipG69lXOjGMX7F7qxJQzUoiUsd.jpg A couple and their 12-year-old son move into a giant house for the summer. Things start acting strange almost immediately. It seems that every time someone gets hurt on the grounds, the beat-up house seems to repair itself. Burnt Offerings
